rawData.title: The fixer's dilemma: Chris Lehane and OpenAI's impossible mission | TechCrunch
rawData.summary: OpenAI's VP of global policy Chris Lehane faces challenges defending the company's actions around copyright issues with Sora, its video generation tool, and managing concerns about massive data center infrastructure impacts on local communities.

rawData.title: Hollywood has no idea what to do about AI
rawData.summary: Major Hollywood studios and executives are struggling to formulate a clear response to OpenAI's AI video generation tools and content training practices, while OpenAI continues to move quickly with products like Sora despite copyright concerns.

rawData.title: OpenAI allegedly sent police to an AI regulation advocate’s door
rawData.summary: OpenAI reportedly sent sheriff's deputies to serve subpoenas to AI regulation advocates, demanding personal messages and communications with legislators, allegedly to investigate potential connections to Elon Musk's funding.

rawData.title: Bose is yanking key features from its SoundTouch speakers
rawData.summary: Bose will discontinue cloud-based features for SoundTouch speakers in February 2026, including integrated Spotify access, multi-room playback, and app functionality, though Bluetooth and AUX connections will still work.

rawData.title: OpenAI is trying to clamp down on ‘bias’ in ChatGPT
rawData.summary: OpenAI reports that its new GPT-5 models show 30% less political bias than previous versions, based on internal testing using hundreds of politically charged questions across various topics.

rawData.title: These Steelseries Earbuds Have Barely Been Out of My Head in Months—and They’re on Sale
rawData.summary: The SteelSeries Arctis GameBuds, currently on sale for $128, offer versatile gaming audio with both USB-C dongle and Bluetooth connectivity, featuring game-specific equalizer settings and 40-hour total battery life with the charging case.

rawData.title: The billion-dollar infrastructure deals powering the AI boom | TechCrunch
rawData.summary: Major tech companies are making massive infrastructure investments to power AI development, with Oracle securing $330B in cloud deals, Nvidia engaging in GPU-for-equity arrangements, and companies like Microsoft and Amazon forming strategic computing partnerships with AI firms.

rawData.title: You can still snag LG’s C4 OLED TV at half the price
rawData.summary: LG's 48-inch C4 OLED TV is on sale for $799.96 ($800 off) at Amazon, while the newer C5 model starts at $899.99, with both models offering excellent display quality, gaming features, and Dolby Vision/Atmos support.

rawData.title: Prezent raises $30 million to acquire AI services firms -- starting with founder's other company | TechCrunch
rawData.summary: AI presentation startup Prezent has raised $30M to acquire AI services firms, starting with Prezentium, a presentation company in life sciences founded by its own CEO, bringing its total funding to $74M and valuation to $400M.

rawData.title: Chrome will automatically disable web notifications you don’t care about
rawData.summary: Google Chrome is introducing an automatic feature that disables notifications from websites users consistently ignore, with less than 1% of web notifications currently receiving any user interaction.

rawData.title: Boox’s new smartphone-sized e-readers come with a steep price hike
rawData.summary: Boox has announced new P6 Pro e-readers in China featuring 6.13-inch displays, with the color model using E Ink Kaleido 3 technology and priced at $463, marking a significant price increase from previous models.

rawData.title: Samsung SmartThings finally adds support for joining existing Thread networks
rawData.summary: Samsung SmartThings has added support for Thread network credential sharing, allowing its compatible hubs to join existing Thread networks from other manufacturers and share credentials with third-party border routers, marking a step forward in smart home device interoperability.

rawData.title: Instagram head Adam Mosseri pushes back on MrBeast’s AI fears but admits society will have to adjust | TechCrunch
rawData.summary: Instagram head Adam Mosseri argues that AI will democratize content creation while acknowledging society must adapt to a world where video evidence can't be automatically trusted as real.

rawData.title: You can now connect your Spotify account to ChatGPT: Here’s how to do it | TechCrunch
rawData.summary: OpenAI has integrated Spotify into ChatGPT, allowing users to connect their accounts to create personalized playlists, get music recommendations, and control playback based on their listening history and preferences.

rawData.title: Apple’s executive reshuffling isn’t over
rawData.summary: Apple is reorganizing executive roles with Eddy Cue taking over health and fitness teams, while chip division head Johnny Srouji is reportedly considering his future at the company following Jeff Williams' planned retirement.

rawData.title: So much for Ford and GM’s scheme to extend the EV tax credit
rawData.summary: Ford and GM have abandoned their plan to extend the $7,500 EV tax credit through dealer lease arrangements after Republican senators flagged the strategy to the Treasury Department as a loophole.

rawData.title: Edifier’s new wireless speaker looks like a gaming PC
rawData.summary: Edifier has launched the Huazai New Cyber speaker in China, a Bluetooth speaker designed to look like a gaming PC with RGB lighting, exposed electronics, and a 2.8-inch display screen that can show system metrics when connected to a computer.

rawData.title: You can still get the latest AirPods Max at their Prime Day price
rawData.summary: Apple's USB-C AirPods Max headphones are available for $429.99 ($120 off) at major retailers, matching their Prime Day pricing and featuring 24-bit lossless audio playback capability when connected via USB-C.

rawData.title: Former UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak to advise Microsoft and Anthropic  | TechCrunch
rawData.summary: Former UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has taken senior advisory roles at Microsoft and Anthropic, prompting concerns from Parliament's Advisory Committee about potential unfair access and influence in AI regulation and government affairs.

rawData.title: Fractal’s Scape is proof that $200 can get you a luxurious gaming headset
rawData.summary: Fractal Design's first gaming headset, the $200 Scape, features a minimalist Scandinavian design, magnetic charging dock, dual microphone options, and over 40 hours of battery life with customizable RGB lighting.
